content.html: This is a “vaccination” for the log4j vulnerability Given a vulnerable piece of software, it exploits the log4j vulnerability, just to install a new piece of code that prevents exploiting it in the future Ethical? github.com/Cybereason/Log…
content.value:
This is a “vaccination” for the log4j vulnerability

Given a vulnerable piece of software, it exploits the log4j vulnerability, just to install a new piece of code that prevents exploiting it in the future

Ethical?

github.com/Cybereason/Log…
